sentences.en: Beach users have complained about people walking their dogs on the sand.
sentences.cn: 海滩上的游客投诉有人在沙滩上遛狗。

sentences.en: For an evening stroll the beach at Dieppe is hard to beat.
sentences.cn: 傍晚散步去迪耶普的海滩简直是不二之选。

sentences.en: Her favourite subjects are shells spotted on beach walks.
sentences.cn: 她最喜爱的题材是那些在海边散步时发现的贝壳。

sentences.en: I was happy enough to laze about on the beach.
sentences.cn: 可以在沙滩上懒洋洋地躺着，我高兴极了。

sentences.en: Issa's white beach hat gleamed in the harsh lights.
sentences.cn: 伊萨的白色沙滩帽在刺眼的阳光下闪闪发亮。

sentences.en: Lying on the beach all week isn't my scene.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢整个星期都躺在沙滩上。

sentences.en: Meet me down at the beach tomorrow, at 6am sharp.
sentences.cn: 明天早上6点整在海滩上跟我见面。

sentences.en: Nearby there is a stretch of white sand beach perfect for sunbathing.
sentences.cn: 附近有一片白色沙滩，是沐日光浴的绝佳场所。

sentences.en: Schools regularly bring children to the beach for natural history lessons.
sentences.cn: 学校经常安排孩子们去海滩上博物学课。

sentences.en: Some stretches of beach are completely underwater at high tide.
sentences.cn: 海滩上有些地方在涨潮时完全淹没在水中。

sentences.en: The shop stocks an extensive range of beach wear.
sentences.cn: 这家商店备有各式各样的沙滩服装。

sentences.en: They flew in over the beach, casting a huge shadow.
sentences.cn: 它们飞到海滩上空，抛下一大片黑影。

sentences.en: They found her walking alone and depressed on the beach.
sentences.cn: 他们碰见她独自一人神色忧郁地走在海滩上。

sentences.en: We found a secluded beach a few miles further on.
sentences.cn: 我们又前行了几英里，发现了一处僻静的海滩。

sentences.en: We got to the beach at five of one in the afternoon.
sentences.cn: 我们下午1点差5分的时候到达海滩。

phrases.tran_cn: （在海滨，游泳池等玩的）大充气球，水皮球
沙滩毛巾；沙滩浴巾；海滩浴巾
n. （美）遮阳伞（海滨或花园用的）
长滩（美国加州西南部港市）；长滩（美国纽约州东南部城市）
迈阿密海滩（位于美国佛罗里达州）
adj. 在海滩上；失业的；潦倒的；退休的
棕榈滩（位于美国佛罗里达州东南部）
维珍尼亚滩（美国弗吉尼亚州东南部城市）
西棕榈滩（美国度假胜地）

trans.tran_en: an area of sand or small stones at the edge of the sea or a lake
an area of sand or small stones at the edge of the sea or a lake
to pull a boat onto the shore away from the water
